sentences.en: A good accountant can analyze an unprofitable operation quickly.
sentences.cn: 一名优秀的会计师能迅速分析出亏损的环节.

sentences.en: Accountant John Talbot is a wizard with numbers.
sentences.cn: 会计师约翰·塔尔博特精通数字。

sentences.en: At this point, the accountant did a runner — with all my bank statements, expenses and receipts.
sentences.cn: 这个时候，会计溜了——带走了我所有的银行结算单、资金和收据。

sentences.en: Bill asked his accountant to try to get around the tax laws.
sentences.cn: 比尔要他的会计试着逃税.

sentences.en: Do you want me to invite your accountant to this meeting?
sentences.cn: 你想让我把你的会计师也邀请到会议里么？

sentences.en: He began his professional life as an accountant, the very model of respectability and conservatism.
sentences.cn: 他开始了会计师的职业生涯，一份典型的体面而保守的工作。

sentences.en: He gave up mathematics , of course, and became an accountant.
sentences.cn: 当然他放弃了数学, 成了一名会计.

sentences.en: He was satisfied with his earnings as an accountant.
sentences.cn: 他对自己会计师的收入很满意。

sentences.en: He's not a bad chap—quite human for an accountant.
sentences.cn: 这个家伙人不坏——就会计来说已经很有人情味了。

sentences.en: I send all my income tax query to my accountant.
sentences.cn: 我把所有有关所得税的疑问送交会计师。

sentences.en: I won't know how successful it is until an accountant has gone over the books.
sentences.cn: 要等到会计核查完账簿，我才会知道盈利状况如何。

sentences.en: She has an appointment with her accountant.
sentences.cn: 她和她的会计约好了见面。

sentences.en: She is the town clerk and a certified public accountant and notary public.
sentences.cn: 她身兼城镇文书、执业会计师和公证人数职。

sentences.en: That firm is looking for a new accountant. At present the salary they will offer has been left open.
sentences.cn: 那家公司正在物色一位新的会计, 工资多少尚未确定.

sentences.en: The accountant checked this unnecessary spending in good time.
sentences.cn: 会计及时卡住了这笔不必要的开支.

sentences.en: The accountant disputes the figures you gave him .
sentences.cn: 会计师对你提供的数字提出质疑。

sentences.en: The accountant said it was the most humdrum day that she had ever passed.
sentences.cn: 会计师说这是她所度过的最无聊的一天.

sentences.en: The boss dropped an accountant from the payroll.
sentences.cn: 老板把一名会计师从在职人员名单中除了名。

sentences.en: They conferred with the accountant vis-a-vis the proposed budget.
sentences.cn: 他们与会计商量有关预算提案的事。

sentences.en: Tomorrow is the day of reckoning; the accountant will tell me what my profits were and how much tax I'll have to pay.
sentences.cn: 明天就是算总账的日子,会计师会告诉我有多少盈利, 该交多少税.

sentences.en: We need an accountant to help from the accounts and tax aspect.
sentences.cn: 我们需要一位会计师从账目和税的角度来帮忙。

words.tran_cn: 会计工作；会计学；会计师之职

phrases.tran_cn: 注册会计师；审定会计师
注册会计师；会计师；特许会计师
总会计师；会计主任，会计处长
初级会计师；助理会计员

trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to keep and check financial accounts, calculate taxes etc
